lead_paragraph: The hosting United States were drawn into the group of death for  the 2016 Copa America Centenario on Sunday, opening against Colombia in the 100th anniversary of soccer's oldest international championship.

headline.print_headline: U.S. in Group of Death for Copa America Centenario
headline.main: U.S. in Group of Death for Copa America Centenario
